thread.title: All Halloween Themed Items are Buy One Get One Free at the 99 Cents Only Stores
thread.title_full: All Halloween Themed Items are Buy One Get One Free at the 99 Cents Only Stores - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: All Halloween Themed Items are Buy One Get One Free at the 99 Cents Only Stores
text:
99 Cents Only Stores
CITY OF COMMERCE, Calif. , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- All Halloween themed items including costumes, masks, accessories, make-up, decorations, candy buckets and more are buy one get one free at the 99 Cents Only Stores. This special offer is available now through November 1 st .
Affordably decorate your front door to welcome trick-or-treaters with the variety of quality decorations available. Create complete and/or last minute costumes on a budget. Your local 99 Cents Only Store has everything you need to have a safe and happy Halloween !
About 99 Cents Only Stores
Founded in 1982, 99 Cents Only Stores is the leading operator of extreme value stores in California and the Southwestern United States . The Company currently operates 389 stores located in California , Texas , Arizona & Nevada .
99 Cents Only Stores offers a broad assortment of name brand and other attractively priced merchandise and compelling seasonal product offerings.
Media Contact: Desiree Anderson , 213-393-5736 or desiree.anderson@99only.com
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20140211/LA62673LOGO
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/all-halloween-themed-items-are-buy-one-get-one-free-at-the-99-cents-only-stores-300162398.html
